page_content:
Marriott’s people-first culture and our TakeCare commitment provide opportunity, community, 
and purpose, creating the foundation of a great workplace for all. We are honored to be 
recognized as a leader in advancing diversity, equity, and inclusion, most recently as one of 
the World’s Best Workplaces™ by Great Place to Work® and #1 on DiversityInc’s 2020 Top 50 
Companies for Diversity list. EMPOWER  
THROUGH  
OPPORTUNITY
Image: Women Food and Beverage associates from around the U.S. gather at The Ritz-Carlton, Fort Lauderdale.
2020 SERVE 360 REPORT
